overview: 'Distorted' is a short film based on 'schizophrenia', a mental illness that acts as a slow death sentence for many. The protagonist is suffering from schizophrenia and ends up in a messy situation due to no fault of his own.
tagline: The protagonist is suffering from schizophrenia and ends up in a messy situation due to no fault of his own.
title: Distorted - A Schizophrenia Story
